name: @gitgovernance/cli
description: The canonical command-line interface for the GitGovernance ecosystem, designed for efficient collaboration between humans and AI agents.

scripts.build:full: esbuild src/cli-tui.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --outfile=dist/gitgov.mjs --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external:react-devtools-core --external:commander --external:ink --external:react --external:assert --external:events --external:util --external:path --external:fs --external:crypto && chmod +x dist/gitgov.mjs && esbuild src/cli-tui.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node20 --outfile=dist/cli-tui.cjs --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external:react-devtools-core --external:commander --external:ink --external:react --external:assert --external:events --external:util --external:path --external:fs --external:crypto && cp dist/cli-tui.cjs dist/bundle.cjs
scripts.release: pnpm build && pnpm build:binaries && pnpm publish

author: GitGovernance Team
